name: play sound
info:
Play a sound on a specified node

defaults to play the test.wav on "all" nodes

You can set the "node" and "sound" on this node, 
or as input values on msg.node and msg.sound

name: increase tag's counter

label: Select flow state
tooltip: This will be passed on to the node status LED

name: set flow status - passed to rpi's status
func: flow.set('gamestate', msg.payload);

label: XP add node
tooltip: The selected node will be the one that increases the XP

name: set node chosen to be the incrementor
func: flow.set('xp-incrementor', msg.payload);

name: select the node to increment the XP
reply to node ping with gamestate colour
NODES
format:
nodeiplast seen
{{obj.name}} {{obj.ip}} {{obj.timestring}}

name: TAGS
format:
nodereadertagidcount
{{obj.from}} {{obj.reader}} {{obj.tag}} {{obj.count}} {{obj.count}}

name: store node info
Remote Node status
info:
## All Nodes connected to this game server

Listens to Ping messages, and stores the node
info in the database with the timestamp.

### TODO

Add a Node management UI to select which flow a node belongs to
this selection can then be used to reduce the messages being output
to only those for the flow its on...

name: ALLNODES
format:
nodeiplast seen
{{obj.name}}
 		{{obj.ip}} {{obj.timestring}}

name: sort time desc
func:
msg.sort = { "time": -1 }
return msg;

name: Character Gen

func:
msg['payload']['Health'] = 'Dead';
node.send([msg]);

name: Fn

func:
msg.payload = msg.payload+1;
return msg;

msg.payload = msg.payload+1;
return msg;

name: parseFloat
func:
msg.payload = parseFloat(msg.payload);
return msg;

name: High
func:
msg.payload ="High";
return msg;

name: Low
func:
msg.payload = "Low"
return msg;
